48-622.02.Nebraska Training and Support Cash Fund; termination; payment of grants.

The Nebraska Training and Support Cash Fund is created. The fund terminates on July 1, 2025, and the State Treasurer shall transfer any money in the fund on such date to the Workforce Development Program Cash Fund. Grants awarded from the Nebraska Training and Support Cash Fund prior to the transfer but remaining unpaid on July 1, 2025, may be paid from the Workforce Development Program Cash Fund if all conditions of the grant award have been met.

SourceLaws 1994, LB 1337, § 5;Laws 1995, LB 7, § 49;Laws 2009, LB631, § 3;Laws 2012, LB911, § 1;Laws 2014, LB997, § 2;Laws 2016, LB1110, § 13;Laws 2017, LB172, § 22;Laws 2023, LB191, § 11;Laws 2024, LB1413, § 38;Laws 2025, LB265, § 10.Operative Date: July 1, 2025
